template:
Best Practice: Description Completeness
Your Task is to check if the "Description" field of the ticket is complete.
We define a description as complete if it contains the following pieces:
Role: describes who uses the system.
Task: solution or function of the problem.
Capability: refers to one's ability to achieve certain goals under a certain condition.
Goal: describes the problem domain or the impact of solving the problem.

The general format of a user story can be expressed as follows: As a <Role>, I want <Task>, So that <Goal>.

If the description is complete, return the original description.
Otherwise, recommend a new description for the ticket.
